page.title: 04HOUSING - WEST CHESTERFIELD
page.content: {Old Brampton}is a small ribbon settlement 1 mile NE of Chesterfield. Some of the properties are very old. The houses are very expensive, around Â£80 000. The population is very stable and not many of the houses come up for sale. The main type of people who live here are retired folk as well as commuters who travel into Sheffield. The{Somersall}area has different types of housing. The main tenure is owner occupied. The houses at one end of Somersall Lane are very large, detached dwellings. They have extensive gardens front and back. The prices are around Â£80 000-Â£90 000. At the other end of Somersall Lane the houses change. These houses are much smaller and are a mixture of detached and semi-detached. The amount of land is less and so the prices are cheaper, around Â£35 000.
